content.question: This passage is most probably excerpted from

choices.label: an article about Franklin in a business journal
a book about Franklin's scientific research
a biography of Franklin intended for a general audience
a newspaper account of historians' conflicting views of Franklin

content.answer: a biography of Franklin intended for a general audience

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
